entry.title: WINTER STORM WATCH , Gatineau
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:34 PM EST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, -8.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Gatineau Airport 8:00 PM EST Wednesday 11 January 2023
Condition: Mostly Cloudy
Temperature: -8.6°C

Visibility: 24.1 km

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near minus 8.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Periods of snow beginning this evening. Local amount 2 cm. Wind east 20 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 8. Wind chill near minus 17. Forecast issued 5:03 PM EST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of snow. High minus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of snow. Wind east 20 km/h. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 14 in the morning and minus 6 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 5:03 PM EST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow at times heavy. Temperature steady near zero.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Amount 10 to 20 cm. Wind becoming north 30 km/h overnight. Temperature steady near zero. Wind chill minus 6 in the evening. Forecast issued 5:03 PM EST Wednesday 11 January 2023
